concept.title: Passing scenario tags at runtime when building with Jenkins

conbody.p: When running automated tests, you might want to classify different features and scenarios into different tags for better management.
This tutorial guides you through how to set your scenario tags to be executed at runtime when Jenkins Build triggers your tests.

ul.li: Jenkins is already installed. See Jenkins documentation on Installing Jenkins.
Katalon plugin is already installed on Jenkins. See How to use Katalon plugin for Jenkins on Windows.
An active Katalon Runtime Engine license.
